DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , single treatment study . All subject receive 6 month oral contraceptive therapy DR-1021 . Study participant receive physical gynecological exam , include Pap smear . During study , participant require complete diary .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Low-Dose 28-Day Oral Contraceptive
DOC.detailed_description: The overall study duration patient approximately 8 month , include screening period approximately 4 week ; treatment period approximately six month ( six,28-day cycle ) ; follow-up visit approximately 4 week completion study drug .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Not pregnant breastfeed Sexually active risk pregnancy Any contraindication use oral contraceptive Pregnancy within last 3 month Smoking > 10 cigarette per day
